newsitem.title: USA: Resource Bancshares June mortgages up 32pct.
newsitem.headline: Resource Bancshares June mortgages up 32pct.

text.p: Resource Bancshares Mortgage Group Inc said Tuesday its June 1997 mortgage loan production rose 32 percent to $935.8 million from $710.2 million in June 1996.
Subprime mortgage loan production for June was $33.7 million, it said. The company produced no subprime loans for the comparable period of 1996.
For the six months ended June 30, however, mortgage loan production dropped 14 percent to $4.8 billion from $5.6 billion for the same period of 1996, it said.
Subprime mortgage loan production for the first half was $133.8 million, it said. Its locked mortgage loan pipeline was $967.4 million at June 30 versus $606.8 million a year ago.
